title: BRIEF-Cairn Energy Says Abandoned ALOM-1 Well In Offshore Mexico
text:
BRIEF-Cairn Energy Says Abandoned ALOM-1 Well In Offshore Mexico

Stock Markets 20 minutes ago (Oct 28, 2019 12:49)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Cairn Energy Says Abandoned ALOM-1 Well In Offshore Mexico Oct 28 (Reuters) - Cairn Energy PLC : * CAIRN ENERGY PLC - CAIRN HAS COMPLETED FIRST WELL IN ITS DRILLING PROGRAMME OFFSHORE MEXICO * CAIRN ENERGY PLC - OBJECTIVES EXPLORATION TARGET OF ALOM-1 WELL FOUND TO BE DRY AND WELL WILL NOW BE PERMANENTLY PLUGGED AND ABANDONED * CAIRN ENERGY PLC - WELL WAS DRILLED TO A VERTICAL DEPTH OF 2,056M BELOW SEA SURFACE AND WAS TERMINATED IN PLEISTOCENE SECTION

BRIEF-Cairn Energy Says Abandoned ALOM-1 Well In Offshore Mexico
description: BRIEF-Cairn Energy Says Abandoned ALOM-1 Well In Offshore Mexico
